description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. Item 1, GSIN: N6145, NSN: 99-1908885, CABLE, POWER, ELECTRICAL...
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Overview

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of electrical power cables. This tender invitation is a request for proposal (RFP) under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Scope of Work

The department requires the following items:

* Cable, Power, Electrical, NSN: 99-1908885, GSIN: N6145 (Description and specifications can be found in the attached amendment and RFP documents)
* Delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

## Submission Requirements

To be considered for this tender invitation, bidders must submit the following:

* Equivalent or substitute products must be identified by brand name and model, or part number and NCAGE
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars
* Documents must be submitted in either official language of Canada

## Evaluation Criteria

The tender evaluation process will be carried out on the basis of the RFP documents and any additional requirements specified by the department.

## Important Dates

* Tender closing date: 2023-03-24T14:00:00
* Amendment 1 was posted on 2023-02-24

## Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding this tender invitation, please contact:

* Johan Vizcaya-Collado, Contracting Authority
* Email: [johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca](mailto:johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

## Attachments

The tender documents, including the amendment and RFP, can be found at the following links:

* Amendment 1: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/24/0012d3e900ed8559bc91ee33959af555/amendment_001_-_w8482-230715_en.pdf>
* RFP: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/9c20c85130f0485ff16eafd12c4faddc/rfp_w8482-230715_en.pdf>
